channel.title: Packer on Scott's Weblog
channel.description: Recent content in Packer on Scott's Weblog

item.title: HashiConf 2017 Wrap Up
item.description: HashiConf 2017 is a wrap for me, and as I’m sitting here at the airport lounge in Austin I’d thought I’d post links back to the liveblogs I published as well as a few thoughts on the conference overall.

item.title: Liveblog: Journey to the Cloud with Packer and Terraform
item.description: This is a liveblog of the HashiConf 2017 breakout session titled “Journey to the Cloud with Packer and Terraform,” presented by Nadeem Ahmad, a senior software developer at Box.
